Nov. 6, 2010 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
Norris Cultural Arts Center, St. Charles, Illinois, USA Most entertaining band: Dublin Silver Band Best cornet of the day: Bob Hinckley (Brass Band of Central Florida) Best featured brass soloist: Robert Miller (euphonium, Weston Silver Band) Best performance of a march: Prairie Brass Band (playing ?) Best new composition or arrangement: Give It One (played by Brass Band of Central Florida) Most outstanding percussion section: Dublin Silver Band
Dec. 23, 2010, 11:39 p.m. Oct. 15, 2014, 10:43 a.m.
